## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass (`pnpm test`)
- [ ] Types check (`pnpm run types`)
- [ ] Lint passes (`pnpm run lint`)
- [ ] Docs updated (if needed)
- [ ] Synced discoveries (`pnpm run sync:push`)
